The Ministry of Public Works (Including Public Undertakings) is a Ministry of the Government of Maharashtra.
state (Maharashtra State Road Development Corporation - MSRDC).
The Ministry is headed by a cabinet level Minister. Eknath Shinde
is Current Deputy Chief Minister and Minister of Public Works (Including Public Undertakings) Government of Maharashtra.
